name: Quickfall
description:
--CONTROLS--

Arrow keys or tilt your mobile device to move

I had a much more ambitious project planned to submit but the project files were all corrupted so i was forced to throw together this. it's not the best but i'm just glad i had something to submit

Title theme by Patrick De Arteaga (https://patrickdearteaga.com/chiptune-8-bit-retro/)

Music by Bor (@BoracciOST on Twitter)
